entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Newmarket
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:14 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -13.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: King City North 08:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: -13.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.3 kPa rising
Humidity: 76 %
Wind Chill: -21
Dewpoint: -17.0°C
Wind: SW 15 km/h gust 34 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow and blowing snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow and blowing snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 80. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 24 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Blowing snow this evening. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 10. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
